data.text: @WalesOnline Live with c19 end the restrictions asap
@WalesOnline Just keep a small infrastructure in place in case we get a bad variant later in the year.  Be crazy to remove everything
@WalesOnline Rules? Stopped adhering to the ‘rules’ a long time ago
@WalesOnline After 2 years, i totally understand why people are fed up of hearing about covid reviews. However, whilst the worst is over, it has NOT gone away.

@kerrysmith654 @WalesOnline I went to the supermarket today and definitely more people are ignoring his mask mandate. But there are still others so terrified they wear masks outside. Why? All the studies show how important fresh air is. Take them off, take a deep breath and enjoy it.

@WalesOnline He can seriously go and get lost now with 2 years of his doctrinal crap. More serious things going on with the world. Putin just took your power away, go and sort him out, you have stopped our lifes for 2 years its over!
